title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package that adds Ollama as a native LLM and embeddings provider inside LangChain.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama comparable to ChatGPT UI; supports multi-model chats, RAG, user auth.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; supports chat, generate and embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement via VS-Code extension and language-server.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team: use local models for question-answering pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, strongly-typed requests/responses and DI support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose stacks for CPU & GPU (CUDA, ROCm) deployments of Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + llama-cpp-vector for private document Q&A.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Lightweight Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that adds local AI assistance for summarizing notes and answering questions.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin to run private LLM prompts inside your vault without cloud calls.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package: Python client for chatting, generating and managing Ollama models.

title: reddit/r/ollama
summary: Active subreddit for discussing new models, integrations and troubleshooting Ollama setups.
